ygData.subject: Re: Help w/ Dismal Rage quests (poss spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: The traitor is the same one the Paladins go see in the back of the Malitia house... Alyle or something.  He is in the corner under stone overhang to the right
ygData.messageBody:
The traitor is the same one the Paladins go see in the
back of the Malitia house... Alyle or something. He is
in the corner under stone overhang to the right as you
enter the grass from the militia house.

--
Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous



>From: demon42@...
>
>If you give him the note he talks about finding a traitor in the
ranks of
>the militia from the paladins, though at this point I dont know who
is the
>traitor and I am warry of slaughtering guards if I am not 100% sure
who i am
>looking for.
>
>Tesaar Grimm
>Hand of Innoruuk
>The Rathe
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Grant, Joseph [mailto:JGrant@...]
>Sent: Thursday, September 23, 1999 12:46 PM
>To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Help w/ Dismal Rage quests (poss spoiler)
>
>
>From: "Grant, Joseph" <JGrant@...>
>
>I read the other posts.. their close but not spot on. Sir Lucan
is on the
>ground floor of the militia building. AS you first enter it, hes
at the
>room at the far end of the first corridor - there is a second room
past 2
>guards.
>
>The person you need to kill is not Altunic Jartin! Its someone fishing
near
>a lake.... Steal his note and hand it in to the SK guild in freeport
>instead of Sir Lucan - I'm actually going to do it again to see what
happens
>if you give Lucan the note.
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
>Sent: 23 September 1999 18:34
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Help w/ Dismal Rage quests (poss spoiler)
>
>
>From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>
>"Grant, Joseph" wrote:
>>
>> From: "Grant, Joseph" <JGrant@...>
>>
>> I think the Militia leader is Sir Lucan. You can increase your
faction
>with
>> the militia by killing Deathfist orcs or the Paladins of North
freeport
>> (most fun!) You can get to north freeport via the tunnels.
>>
>
>Which part of Freeport is Sir Lucan in? I can travel freely in North
>Freeport, but I assume he is not there, since that is Pally land.
I
>think once upon a time I could travel in Freeport, but then I discovered
>Krazen Loosh...
>
>> The note for Sir Lucan is gained somewhere in the West Commonlands,
I also
>> believe that this quest is the exact reverse of a paladin quest,
the
>> paladins have to find and save this character, we have to kill
him....
>
>So I have heard, but I want to do all the steps so I can see if
>there's some hint in there someone has missed.
>
>Xilith
